comment.body:
An MLet that is not added to the {@link ClassLoaderRepository}. This class acts exactly like its parent class, {@link MLet}, with one exception. When a PrivateMLet is registered in an MBean server, it is not added to that MBean server's {@link ClassLoaderRepository}. This is true because this class implements the interface {@link PrivateClassLoader}.
@since 1.5 @since.unbundled JMX 1.2
